Product List

Through our many years of experience in the offshore industry in Seychelles, we are able to offer assistance and advice with regard to the following Seychelles Offshore Products:

Seychelles International Business Company (IBC)

A no-tax company with privacy guaranteed by law. Fast and efficient name approval and registration—usually same day or next day at the latest.

More Details
Seychelles International Trusts

A useful tool for asset protection, the Seychelles International Trust also guarantees privacy, with no disclosure of settler or beneficiaries details.

More Details
Company (Special Licence) (CSL)

A Seychelles domestic “low tax” company, issued with a Special Licence granting it certain offshore concessions.

More Details
Yacht Registration under the Seychelles Flag

Seychelles is one of the fastest growing and most efficient Yacht Registries in the world.

More Details

If you require information on any of our other products and services, please contact us. We will be happy to assist you.
